Job__41.16__Angels: Elim, Hebrewwhich signifies here, the mighty, the most valiant, shall fear this monstrous fish, and in their fear shall seek to be purified.
Job__41.21__Under him: He shall not value the beams of the sun; and gold to him shall be like mire.
Job__41.23__The deep as growing old: Growing hoary, as it were with the froth which he leaves behind him.
Job__41.25__He is king: He is superior in strength to all that are great and strong amongst living creaturesmystically it is understood of the devil, who is king over all the proud.
